definition: variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

sentences.english: Is your focus on productivity starting to make you feel miserable or stressed out?
sentences.chinese: 如果你追求效能时开始感到痛苦或是精疲力竭？

sentences.english: Google can shut down its phone manufacturing operations, or sell it off.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌可以关停手机生产部门，或是再次将其出售。

sentences.english: The type of an access intent can be either read or update.
sentences.chinese: 访问意图的类型可以是读取或是更新。

sentences.english: Make your records available to the local and national record committees.
sentences.chinese: 将自己的纪录提供给地区或是全国性的纪录委员会。

sentences.english: They might suck their thumb, seek out a blanket or so on.
sentences.chinese: 吮大拇指，或是去寻找毯子之类的。

sentences.english: Volunteer to coach or assistant coach a kids sports team.
sentences.chinese: 志愿去做孩子们的运动队教练，或是教练助理。

sentences.english: Bull Market Correcting or Bear Returning?
sentences.chinese: 此际是牛市调整或是熊市回头？

sentences.english: Keep valves closed when cylinders are not in service or empty.
sentences.chinese: 当钢瓶没有使用或是空瓶的时候，保持阀门关闭。

sentences.english: Hilary:Do you take naps at noon or feel sleepy?
sentences.chinese: 你白天有睡午觉或是打瞌睡吗？

sentences.english: Mentors are not to repair robots or be involved in programming of students' robots.
sentences.chinese: 不允许教練修復机械人或是參与编写程序。

sentences.english: In primitive tribes, dreams were thought to be the indication of God or the haunting of the devil.
sentences.chinese: 在原始部落中，梦被当成天神降临或是妖魔附体。

sentences.english: This law also applies if the bull gores a son or daughter.
sentences.chinese: 牛无论触了人的儿子或是女儿，必照这例办理。

sentences.english: It could be the name of a lolly , or a game.
sentences.chinese: 它可能是一种棒糖或是一种游戏的名字。

sentences.english: Or the one where Elaine bids on JFK’s golf clubs?
sentences.chinese: 或是伊琳竞投肯尼迪高尔夫俱乐部？

sentences.english: And that we should not worry about the deficit next year or even the year after.
sentences.chinese: 而且我们不应该担心明年或是后年的财政赤字。

sentences.english: He is going to scalp me or burn me at the stake.
sentences.chinese: 他要剥掉我的头皮或是在火刑柱上烧我。

definition: some/a few/a little/(following an adjective) slightly ...er
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
whatever/no matter what (who, how etc)/regardless of/not to discuss
usually/in many cases/more often than not
